Verses: 1 aathsorin Raajaavaagiya Yaapeen Adhai Kelvippattapodhu, Avan Maathonin Raajaavaagiya Yopaapidaththirkum, Simronin Raajaavidaththukkum, Aksaapin Raajaavidaththirkum,
2 vadakkeyirukkira Malaigalilum Kinnaroththukku Therkeyirukkira Naattuppuraththilum Samaboomiyilum Merku Ellaiyaagiya Thorilum Irukkira Raajaakkalidaththirkum,

3 kizhakkeyum Merkeyumirukkira Kaanaaniyaridaththirkum, Malaigalilirukkira Emoriyar, Eththiyar, Perisiyar, Eboosiyaridaththirkum, Ermon Malaiyin Adiyile Mispaa Seemaiyilirukkira Eviyaridaththirkum Aal Anuppinaan.
4 avargal Kadarkarai Manalaippol Eraalamaana Thiranda Janamaagiya Thangaludaiya Ellaa Senaigalodum, Magaa Eraalamaana Kudhiraigalodum Radhangalodumkooda Purappattaargal.
5 indha Raajaakkalellaarum Koodi, Isravelode Yuththampannavandhu, Merom Engira Eriyandaiyile Egamaai Paalayamiranginaargal.

6 appozhudhu Karththar Yosuvaavai Nokki: Avargalukku Bayappadaayaaga, Naalai Inneraththile Naan Avargalaiyellaam Isravelukku Munbaaga Vettundavargalaaga Oppukkoduppen; Nee Avargal Kudhiraigalin Kudhikaal Narambugalai Aruththu, Avargal Radhangalai Akkiniyaal Sutterikkakkadavaai Endraar.
7 yosuvaavum, Avanodekooda Yuththa Janangal Anaivarum, Thiteerendru Merom Eriyandaiyilirukkira Avargalidaththil Vandhu, Avargalmel Vizhundhaargal.

8 karththar Avargalai Isravelin Kaiyil Oppukkoduththaar; Avargalai Muriya Adiththu, Periya Seedhonmattum Misrapodhmaayeemattum, Kizhakkeyirukkira Mispe Pallaththaakkumattum Thuraththi, Avargalil Oruvarum Meedhiyaayiraadhabadi, Avargalai Vettippottaargal.
9 yosuvaa Karththar Thanakku Sonnabadi Avargalukku Seydhu, Avargal Kudhiraigalin Kudhigaal Narambugalai Aruththu, Avargal Radhangalai Akkiniyaal Sutteriththaan.
10 akkaalaththile Yosuvaa Thirumbi, Aathsoraippidiththu, Adhin Raajaavai Pattayaththinaal Vettippottaan; Aathsor Munne Andha Raajyangalukkellaam Thalaimaiyaana Pattanamaayirundhadhu.
11 adhilirundha Narajeevangalaiyellaam Pattayakkarukkinaal Vetti, Sangaarampanninaargal; Suvaasamulladhu Ondrum Meedhiyaanadhillai; Aathsoraiyo Akkiniyaal Sutteriththaan.

12 andha Raajaakkaludaiya Ellaappattanangalaiyum Avaigaludaiya Ellaa Raajaakkalaiyum Yosuvaa Pidiththu, Pattayakkarukkinaal Vetti, Karththarudaiyadhaasanaagiya Mose Kattalaiyittabadi, Avargalai Sangaarampanninaan.
13 aanaalum Thangal Aranippode Irundha Pattanangalaiyellaam Isravelar Sutteriththuppodaamal Vaiththaargal; Aathsoraimaaththiram Yosuvaa Sutteriththuppottaan.

14 andha Pattanangalilulla Mirugajeevangalaiyum Matrakkollai Porulgalaiyum Isravel Puththirar Thangalukkendru Eduththukkondaargal; Aanaalum Ellaa Manusharaiyum Azhiththu Theerumattum Avargalai Pattayakkarukkinaal Vettippottaargal; Suvaasamulla Ondraiyum Avargal Meedhiyaaga Vaikkavillai.

15 karththar Thamadhu Dhaasanaagiya Mosekku Eppadi Kattalaiyittirundhaaro, Appadiye Mose Yosuvaavukku Kattalaiyittirundhaan; Appadiye Yosuvaa Seydhaan; Avan,karththar Mosekku Kattalaiyittadhil Ondraiyum Seyyaamal Vidavillai.

16 indhappiragaaramaaga Yosuvaa Seyeerukku Erippogira Aalaak Malaidhuvakki Leebanonin Pallaththaakkil Ermon Malaiyadiyil Irukkira Paagaal Kaadhmattumulla Andha Muzhudhesamaagiya Malaigalaiyum, Thendhesam Yaavaiyum, Kosen Dhesaththaiyum, Samanaana Boomiyaiyum, Naattuppuraththaiyum, Isravelin Malaigalaiyum Adhin Samaboomiyaiyum Pidiththukkondu,
17 avaigalin Raajaakkalaiyellaam Pidiththu, Avargalai Vetti Kondrupottaan.
18 yosuvaa Nedunaalaai Andha Raajaakkalellaarodum Yuththampanninaan.
19 gipiyonin Kudigalaagiya Eviyaraiththavira, Oru Pattanamum Isravel Puththirarode Samaadhaanam Pannavillai; Matrellaa Pattanangalaiyum Yuththampanni Pidiththaargal.

20 yuththampanna Isravelukku Edhiraagavarumbadikku, Avargaludaiya Irudhayam Kadinamaanadhum, Ippadiye Avargalperil Irakkam Undaakaamal, Karththar Mosekku Kattalaiyittapadi, Avargalai Azhiththu Sangaarampanninadhum Karththaraal Vandha Kaariyamaayirundhadhu.

21 akkaalaththile Yosuvaa Poi, Malaidesamaagiya Epironilum Thepeerilum Aanaapilum Yoodhaavin Sagala Malaigalilum Isravelin Sagala Malaigalilum Irundha Enaakkiyarai Nikkirakampanni, Avargalai Avargal Pattanangalodumkooda Sangariththaan.
22 isravel Puththirarin Dhesaththil Enaakkiyar Oruvarum Meedhiyaaga Vaikkappadavillai; Kaasaavilum Kaaththilum Asthoththilum Maaththiram Silar Meedhiyaayirundhaargal.

23 appadiye Yosuvaa, Karththar Moseyinidaththil Sonnabadiyellaam Dhesamanaiththaiyum Pidiththu, Adhai Isravelarukku, Avargal Koththirangaludaiya Pangugalinbadiye, Sudhandharamaaga Koduththaan; Yuththam Oindhadhinaal Dhesam Amaidhalaayirundhadhu.
